Game.Name: Luxor- Pharaoh's Challenge
Game.Plot: Embark on a thrilling adventure through the lands of ancient Egypt in the latest installment of the hit LUXOR series. Enjoy 88 gorgeously-rendered levels of brilliantly crisp and stunning graphics portraying pyramids, temples and many more of Egypt’s amazing marvels. Guide your mystical winged-shooter, swooping back and forth, as you destroy an onslaught of magical spheres before they reach the pyramid lying at the end of their path. To help eliminate enemy spheres, LUXOR: Pharaoh’s Challenge features more explosive power-ups than ever before! Prove your expertise by earning 25 spectacular skill badges Ranking system progressively increases power-up effectiveness 13 powerful blessings can be activated to make any level manageable
